mapper.insert: insert into member( id, username, password, mobile, sex, imgpath, addtime, isdelete ) values( #{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{mobile}, #{sex}, #{imgpath}, #{addtime}, 1 )
mapper.select: select * from member where username=#{username} and isdelete=1
select * from member where mobile=#{mobile} and isdelete=1
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password} where mobile=#{mobile}
mapper.select: select id,username,remark,imgpath from member where isdelete=1 order by focuson desc limit #{start},#{end}
mapper.update: update member set focuson=#{focuson}+1 where id=#{id}
update member set fans=#{fans}+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,username,remark,imgpath from member where isdelete=1 and username like "%"#{username}"%" order by focuson desc limit #{start},#{end}
